posts.post_title: wtb: t213, t215 and t216 cobb
posts.post_content: Looking for low grade examples for type card collection. please PM or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if you have examples for sale/trade - thank you!

I have a cobb closing tonight on eBay
